channel.title: MailHog on Pen-y-Fan
channel.description: Recent content in MailHog on Pen-y-Fan

item.title: How to set up Laragon on a new Windows computer (part 5) - MailHog
item.description: Laragon ships with Mail Catcher, which intercepts mail sent using the PHP mail() function. MailHog goes one step further and acts as a local mailbox. No mail will ever leave the local PC!
